task: Coordinate and execute a sustainable and eco-friendly family reunion event, ensuring it meets the following criteria: 1. Select a venue with eco-certifications and capabilities to host 75 guests with minimal carbon footprint. 2. Implement a green transportation plan, prioritizing carpooling and electric vehicles. 3. Organize a multi-day schedule focusing on nature-based activities and workshops on sustainability. 4. Arrange for catering services using locally sourced, organic produce. 5. Setup a waste management system that emphasizes recycling and composting. 6. Monitor carbon emissions and provide a report to attendees. 7. Keep the entire event under a budget of $7,500.

agents.name: client_agent
agents.role: Primary agent orchestrating the eco-friendly family reunion planning, facilitating communication with users, and delegating tasks to specialized agents.

agents.name: venue_coordination_agent
agents.role: Handles the selection and coordination of venues with eco-certifications.

agents.name: transportation_planning_agent
agents.role: Develops transportation plans that minimize emissions, focusing on green options like carpooling and electric vehicles.

agents.name: activity_planning_agent
agents.role: Creates the event's schedule, prioritizing nature-based activities and educational workshops on sustainability.

agents.name: catering_planning_agent
agents.role: Organizes catering services that prioritize sustainability through the use of organic, locally sourced produce.

agents.name: waste_management_agent
agents.role: Establishes an efficient waste management system centered around recycling and composting practices.

agents.name: carbon_emission_monitoring_agent
agents.role: Tracks and monitors carbon emissions throughout the event, providing comprehensive reports.

agents.name: budget_management_agent
agents.role: Ensures the budget stays within $7,500 while aligning with sustainable practices.

agents.name: eco_certified_venue_agent
agents.role: Identifies and procures eco-certified venues that meet the event's sustainability standards.

agents.name: carpooling_agent
agents.role: Coordinates carpooling arrangements to reduce the transportation carbon footprint.

agents.name: eco_transport_network_agent
agents.role: Enhances the transportation network with efficient routes that support carpooling and electric vehicles.

agents.name: electric_vehicle_rental_agent
agents.role: Arranges rentals of electric vehicles for the duration of the event.

agents.name: eco_fuel_management_agent
agents.role: Manages fuel logistics for electric vehicles, ensuring minimal environmental impact.

agents.name: sustainability_workshop_agent
agents.role: Develops and facilitates workshops focused on green practices and sustainability education.

agents.name: guest_interaction_agent
agents.role: Engages guests in interactive sustainability-focused activities and gathers feedback.

agents.name: feedback_agent
agents.role: Collects and analyzes feedback from participants about their experience during the event.

agents.name: local_produce_supplier_agent
agents.role: Sources organic produce from local farms to support sustainable catering operations.

agents.name: organic_meal_agent
agents.role: Crafts meal plans using organic ingredients that are locally sourced.

agents.name: menu_customization_agent
agents.role: Customizes menus to align with dietary preferences and sustainability goals.

agents.name: recycling_coordinator_agent
agents.role: Oversees recycling operations, ensuring waste is properly sorted and processed.

agents.name: composting_specialist_agent
agents.role: Facilitates composting practices to effectively manage biodegradable waste.

agents.name: waste_audit_agent
agents.role: Conducts audits to ensure efficient waste management and recycling practices are followed.

agents.name: emission_reporting_agent
agents.role: Compiles and generates reports on carbon emissions data collected during the event.

agents.name: impact_analysis_agent
agents.role: Conducts an analysis of the environmental impact based on emission data, offering insights for future improvements.

agents.name: report_generation_agent
agents.role: Generates detailed reports on environmental and event metrics for stakeholders.

agents.name: expense_verification_agent
agents.role: Verifies expenses to ensure their adherence to both budget constraints and sustainability goals.

agents.name: budget_allocation_agent
agents.role: Allocates budget efficiently to cover event needs while ensuring sustainability criteria are met.

tools.name: sustainability_audit_tool
tools.description: Evaluates event plans and activities against sustainability criteria, ensuring all practices are environmentally responsible.

planned_activities.description: A list of activities planned for the event with associated environmental impact scores.

impact_score.description: Environmental impact score of the activity.

budget_limit.description: Maximum allowable budget for the event.

tools.name: carbon_footprint_tool
tools.description: Calculates the carbon footprint of event venues and provides recommendations for reducing emissions.

venue_id.description: Identifier for the venue being evaluated.

guest_count.description: Number of guests expected to attend the event.

energy_usage_data.description: Historical energy usage data for the venue.

energy_source.description: Type of energy source used (e.g., Solar, Wind, Electric).

consumption.description: Amount of energy consumed in kWh.
